comments:
Build: F3
A typo in the PDE scenario uncovered this defect.
After you complete steps E3.1 - E3.3 of the scenario, if you want to see a 
preview of the nested feature page as E4.1 suggests, you get the following null 
pointer exception in the log:

Value: High (NPEs are bad), scenario limited to building nested features

relesed NPE check ... will be in Monday build.
Verified...The fix is in the 0621 integration build.
